hadith.arabic-text: حدثنا مسدد، حدثنا أبو عوانة، عن عبد الملك بن عمير، بهذا الحديث قال فكشفوا عانتي فوجدوها لم تنبت فجعلوني في السبى ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by ‘Abd al- Malik b. ‘Umar through a different chain of narrators. This version has: They uncovered my private parts, and when they found that the hair had not begun to grow they put me among the captives.
